title: Not quite Jerusalem
brief_description: Set in a kibbutz, Joanne Pacula and Sam Robards are cast as an Isreali girl and an American volunteer, who meet and fall in love on the kibbutz. Gila (Pacula) is a hardnosed and foulmouthed “kibbutz-nik” who tones down her language when she finds love. Cast includes Kevin McNally, Todd Graff and Selina Cadell.
